question: How do I track my order?
answer: You can track your order by entering your order ID in the order tracking section on our website or by contacting our customer support.

question: What is your return policy?
answer: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be in their original condition with tags attached. Please visit our Returns page for more details.

question: How long does shipping take?
answer: Standard shipping typically takes 3-5 business days within the continental US. Express shipping options are available for 1-2 day delivery.

question: Do you ship internationally?
answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping times vary by destination, typically taking 7-14 business days.

question: How can I change or cancel my order?
answer: You can change or cancel your order within 1 hour of placing it. Please contact our customer service team immediately with your order number.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal, and Apple Pay.

question: Are my payment details secure?
answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your payment information.

question: How do I create an account?
answer: You can create an account by clicking on the 'Sign Up' button at the top of our website and following the registration process.

question: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page, and follow the instructions to reset your password via email.

question: Can I change my shipping address after placing an order?
answer: If your order hasn't been shipped yet, please contact our customer service team as soon as possible to update your shipping address.

question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
answer: Yes, gift wrapping options are available during checkout. Please select the gift wrapping option if you would like to include it with your order.

question: What should I do if I receive a damaged item?
answer: We're sorry for the inconvenience. Please contact our customer support team with your order number and a photo of the damaged item, and we'll help you resolve the issue.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: You can reach our customer support team via email at support@example.com or by calling our hotline at 1-800-123-4567.

question: What are your business hours?
answer: Our customer support is available Monday through Friday, from 9 AM to 5 PM EST.

question: Is my personal information safe?
answer: We take your privacy seriously. Your personal information is stored securely and is never shared with third parties without your consent.

question: How can I subscribe to your newsletter?
answer: You can subscribe to our newsletter by entering your email address at the bottom of our homepage and clicking 'Subscribe.'

question: Do you have a mobile app?
answer: Yes, our mobile app is available for both iOS and Android. You can download it from the App Store or Google Play.

question: Can I return an online order in-store?
answer: Yes, you can return online orders in our physical stores. Please bring your order confirmation and the item in its original packaging.

question: What if I haven't received my order?
answer: If you haven't received your order within the estimated delivery time, please contact our customer support team to investigate the issue.

question: Hi, can you help me?
answer: Hello! I'm here to help. What can I assist you with today?

question: Can I change my order after it's been placed?
answer: You may request a change to your order within 1 hour of placing it by contacting our customer service team. After that, changes may not be possible.

question: Are there any additional fees for international shipping?
answer: International orders may incur additional customs duties or taxes, which are the responsibility of the recipient. Please check with your local customs office for more details.

question: What should I do if I have a question that isn't listed here?
answer: If your question isn't listed, please reach out to our customer support team through our website or give us a call. We're always happy to help.

question: How do I track my order?
answer: Track your order in real-time by entering your 8-digit order ID in the 'Order Tracking' portal on our website. You'll receive live carrier updates and an estimated delivery window.

question: What is your return policy?
answer: Returns are accepted within 30 days. Items must be unopened/unused with original packaging. Start your return at www.yourcompany.com/returns or visit a physical store for instant credit.

question: My order is delayed - what should I do?
answer: Carriers occasionally experience delays. Check tracking for updates. If delayed >48hrs past estimate, contact us for expedited resolution including refunds for express shipping fees.

question: Can I reroute a package after shipping?
answer: We offer package rerouting for $7.99. Contact us with your order number and new address before 10 AM local time of the delivery date.

question: Why was my card declined?
answer: Common reasons: insufficient funds, AVS mismatch, or suspected fraud. We recommend contacting your bank first. You may also try an alternate payment method.

question: Is Apple Pay/Google Pay accepted in stores?
answer: Yes! All our physical retail locations support contactless payments including Apple Pay, Google Wallet, and Samsung Pay.

question: How do I merge multiple accounts?
answer: For account consolidation, email support@company.com from your primary account with subject 'Account Merge' and list associated email addresses.

question: Why am I getting password reset emails I didn't request?
answer: Immediately enable two-factor authentication. This likely indicates someone is attempting access. Forward suspicious emails to security@company.com for investigation.

question: How do I check warranty status?
answer: Enter your 12-digit serial number at www.yourcompany.com/warranty. Coverage includes manufacturing defects but not accidental damage. Extended plans available.

question: Where can I find assembly instructions?
answer: Access digital manuals 24/7 at www.yourcompany.com/manuals. Need help? Video guides are available on our YouTube channel @CompanySupport.

question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
answer: Premium gift wrapping ($4.99) with custom message available during checkout. Select 'This is a gift' and choose from 6 seasonal designs.

question: Can I schedule delivery for a specific date?
answer: Yes! During checkout, choose 'Scheduled Delivery' and select your preferred date (minimum 3 business days from order date).

question: The website won't accept my address
answer: Our system verifies addresses via USPS. If encountering errors: 1) Use USPS format abbreviations 2) Remove special characters 3) Try desktop browser if mobile fails.

question: I didn't receive my order confirmation email
answer: Check spam/junk folders. Still missing? Verify payment was processed at www.yourcompany.com/payment-status. If confirmed, contact us with transaction ID.

question: What's excluded from the return policy?
answer: Final sale items (marked during purchase), personalized products, and digital downloads are non-returnable. Hygiene-sealed products must be unopened.

question: Do you price match competitors?
answer: We price match authorized retailers within 14 days of purchase. Submit a claim at www.yourcompany.com/price-match with competitor's current listing and receipt.

question: What languages does your support team speak?
answer: Our agents are fluent in English, Spanish, and French. For other languages, we offer real-time translation services during live chat.

question: Why was my international order taxed twice?
answer: Some countries charge import duties. These are separate from our checkout taxes. Contact your local customs office for refund processes in your country.

question: How do loyalty points expire?
answer: Points expire 18 months after earning if account becomes inactive (no purchases/redemptions). We send expiration warnings at 60, 30, and 7 days remaining.

question: Can I donate my rewards points?
answer: Yes! Convert points to charity donations at 1:1 ratio. Our current partners include Red Cross, WWF, and Feeding America. Visit your rewards dashboard to donate.

question: I need ADA-compliant support
answer: We offer TTY/TDD services at 1-800-555-0199, video relay support, and alt-text email assistance. Specify needs at www.yourcompany.com/accessibility.

question: Are service animals allowed in stores?
answer: Yes, ADA-defined service animals are welcome. Emotional support animals require prior manager approval due to health code regulations in some locations.
